CustomField.description:
Sets the default appearance for how Knowtify is presented.
Manual: Manually invoke modal Disruptive: Always shows at the opening of a page Pop-Up: Small notification to optionally open modal
If blank, use the appearance specified for the context (Bio Demo Appearance, Gift Processing Appearance, Interim Appearance, Review Transaction (v2) Appearance)
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Sets the default appearance for how Knowtify is presented.
Manual: Manually invoke modal Disruptive: Always shows at the opening of a page Pop-Up: Small notification to optionally open modal
If blank, use the appearance specified for the context (Bio Demo Appearance, Gift Processing Appearance, Interim Appearance, Review Transaction (v2) Appearance)
CustomField.label: Appearance
